00122 #define N_UTIL_PORT_WRITEBITS(port,mask,value)    N_UTIL_SWALLOW_SEMICOLON( (port) = ((port) & (~(mask))) | ((value) & (mask)); )

00154 #define N_UTIL_CALLBACK_DECLARE(callbackType,subscribersArray,numSubscribers) \
00155     static const callbackType* subscribersArray[/*lint -e(506) */ numSubscribers?numSubscribers:1u] = { NULL }; \
00156     static const uint8_t N_UTIL_CONCAT(subscribersArray,_size) = numSubscribers
00157 
00163 #define N_UTIL_CALLBACK_SUBSCRIBE(callbackType, subscribersArray, pNewCb) \
00164     N_UTIL_SWALLOW_SEMICOLON( \
00165         /*lint -e{506} */ \
00166         N_ERRH_ASSERT_FATAL(N_UTIL_CONCAT(subscribersArray,_size) != 0u); \
00167         uint8_t i=(uint8_t)N_UTIL_CONCAT(subscribersArray,_size) - 1u; \
00168         do { \
00169             if (subscribersArray[i] == NULL) \
00170             { \
00171                 subscribersArray[i] = pNewCb; \
00172                 break; \
00173             } \
00174             N_ERRH_ASSERT_FATAL(i != 0u); \
00175             i--; \
00176         } while(/*lint -e(506) */ 1); \
00177     )
00178 
00186 #define N_UTIL_CALLBACK_STATEMENT(callbackType, subscribersArray, statement, member, arguments) \
00187     N_UTIL_SWALLOW_SEMICOLON( \
00188         /*lint -e{506} */ \
00189         if (N_UTIL_CONCAT(subscribersArray,_size) != 0u) \
00190         { \
00191             uint8_t i_ = (uint8_t)N_UTIL_CONCAT(subscribersArray,_size) - 1u; \
00192             do { \
00193                 if ((subscribersArray[i_]) != NULL) \
00194                 { \
00195                     if (subscribersArray[i_]->member != NULL) \
00196                     { \
00197                         statement subscribersArray[i_]->member arguments; \
00198                     } \
00199                 } \
00200                 if (i_ == 0u) \
00201                 { \
00202                     break; \
00203                 } \
00204                 i_--; \
00205             } while (/*lint -e(506) */ 1); \
00206         } \
00207     )
00208 
00215 #define N_UTIL_CALLBACK(callbackType, subscribersArray, member, arguments) \
00216     N_UTIL_CALLBACK_STATEMENT(callbackType, subscribersArray, /* no statement */, member, arguments)
00217

00221 /* Values that defines various kind of reboot used in N_Util_Reboot function*/
00222 typedef enum _N_Util_RebootMethod_t
00223 {
00224     N_Util_RebootMethod_Reset,
00225     N_Util_RebootMethod_JumpToBootloader,
00226     N_Util_RebootMethod_JumpToApplication,
00227 } N_Util_RebootMethod_t;

00229 /***************************************************************************************************
00230 * IN-LINE FUNCTIONS

00232 
00237 static inline uint8_t N_Util_BreakUint32(uint32_t var, uint8_t byteIndex)
00238 {
00239     uint8_t bits = byteIndex * 8u;
00240     var >>= bits;
00241     return (uint8_t)var;
00242 }
00243 
00244 static inline uint32_t N_Util_BuildUint32(uint8_t byte0, uint8_t byte1, uint8_t byte2, uint8_t byte3)
00245 {
00246     return (  (uint32_t)byte0
00247            | (((uint32_t)byte1) << 8u)
00248            | (((uint32_t)byte2) << 16u)
00249            | (((uint32_t)byte3) << 24u) );
00250 }
00251 
00252 static inline uint16_t N_Util_BuildUint16(uint8_t lowByte, uint8_t highByte)
00253 {
00254     return ( (uint16_t)lowByte | (((uint16_t)highByte) << 8u) );
00255 }
00256 
00257 static inline uint8_t N_Util_HighByteUint16(uint16_t a)
00258 {
00259     return (uint8_t)((a >> 8u) & 0xFFu);
00260 }
00261 
00262 static inline uint8_t N_Util_LowByteUint16(uint16_t a)
00263 {
00264     return (uint8_t)(a & 0xFFu);
00265 }

00291 #if defined(_WIN32)

00293     // The PC build doesn't use interrupts, so this is a dummy implementation
00294     typedef bool N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t;
00295 
00296     static inline N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t N_Util_CriticalSection_Enter(void)
00297     {
00298         return TRUE;
00299     }
00300 
00301     static inline void N_Util_CriticalSection_Exit(N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t state)
00302     {
00303     }
00304 
00305 #elif defined(__ICCAVR__)
00306 
00307     typedef uint8_t N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t;
00308 
00309     static inline N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t N_Util_CriticalSection_Enter(void)
00310     {
00311         uint8_t state = SREG;
00312         __disable_interrupt();
00313         return state;
00314     }
00315 
00316     static inline void N_Util_CriticalSection_Exit(N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t state)
00317     {
00318         SREG = state;
00319     }
00320 
00321 #elif defined(__GNUC__)
00322   #if defined(ATMEGA256RFR2) || defined(ATMEGA2564RFR2)
00323     typedef uint8_t N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t;
00324 
00325     static inline N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t N_Util_CriticalSection_Enter(void)
00326     {
00327         uint8_t state = SREG;
00328         cli();
00329         return state;
00330     }
00331 
00332     static inline void N_Util_CriticalSection_Exit(N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t state)
00333     {
00334         SREG = state;
00335     }
00336   #elif defined(ATSAMR21G18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E18A) || defined(ATSAMR21E19A)
00337     typedef uint32_t N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t;
00338 
00339     static inline N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t N_Util_CriticalSection_Enter(void)
00340     {
00341         uint32_t state = __get_PRIMASK();
00342         __disable_irq();
00343         return state;
00344     }
00345 
00346     static inline void N_Util_CriticalSection_Exit(N_Util_CriticalSection_SaveState_t state)
00347     {
00348         __set_PRIMASK(state);
00349     }
00350   #endif
00351 #elif defined (__ICCARM__)

00357         uint32_t state = __get_PRIMASK();

00360     }
00361
